name: Planner 2021
description:
Another year and you are still looking for the right way to be better organized? Don't you like it when the New Year's energy disappears and you are still stuck with the old inefficient organization of work and life?


Here is your new calendar to hang over your desk or hold next to your laptop.

- Year overview

- Quarter overviews

- Month overviews

- And the heart - Weekly Planners


Get full version here: https://gumroad.com/l/HFlLb


Planning for the next week, but don't forget to be active after work and on the weekends

Save important tasks assigned to days or hours

Set goals for the next quarter and months to make changes in your life easier

And all beautifully, clean and minimalistic design.


Get full version here: https://gumroad.com/l/HFlLb
